NK103(pe)012:1: // bdud rtsi chu rgyun che mchog rgyan gyi 'khor lo bzhugs //
NK103(pe)012:3: bo d+hi tsit+tarat+naa mri ta pa napro ta pa ra ma h+aa a lam ka ra tsakra n+aa ma /
NK103(pe)012:5: cis kyang stong pas byang cir yang ma 'gags pas
NK103(pe)012:6: chub 'brel pa kyi rang gsal bas semsrtog med la
NK103(pe)012:7: dgos 'dod 'byung bas rin po che de nyid la
NK103(pe)012:8: bar du gcod pas bdud rtogs pas rtsi goms pa'i
NK103(pe)012:9: chu rgyun che ba lngas mchog tu gyur pa chos
NK103(pe)012:10: sku bde chen gyi rgyan gyis sa brgyan pa nyid
NK103(pe)012:11: longs sku brgyan pa gzhan longs sku thub pa drug
NK103(pe)012:12: /'khor lo rgyun gyis dag ma dag gis don mdzad
NK103(pe)012:13: pa sprul sku zhes bya ba //
NK103(pe)012:14: rang bzhin bcom rnam pa ldan mtshan nyid 'das bar
NK103(pe)012:15: chod kyi bdud la rtogs pa'i rtsi rgyu rkyen med
NK103(pe)012:16: pas rang byung ba chos sku che ba lngas blar
NK103(pe)012:17: gyur pas mchog khrag 'thung he ru ka gnas la
NK103(pe)012:18: thun mong dang khyad par gyis phyag 'tshal lo //
NK103(pe)012:19: rang bzhin la ngos gzung gi spros pa med mtshan
NK103(pe)012:20: nyid yul med par rang gsal rnam pa yon tan
NK103(pe)012:21: thams cad du ma 'gags par bsam yas par gnas
NK103(pe)012:22: pa las // de nyid ma rtogs lhan skyes pas
NK103(pe)012:23: bdag gi phyogs kun brtags su 'dzin te rang snang
NK103(pe)012:24: bas yul du grub pa min cing gsal bar rtogs
NK103(pe)012:25: byed kyi rkyen bzhi dang bral ba'i phyir ro //
NK103(pe)012:26: des 'khrul pa nan gyis sbags pas bde chen la bar du chod de srid pa 'khor bar 'khyams //
NK103(pe)012:27: de nyid rtogs shing goms pas 'bras bu khyad par
NK103(pe)012:28: du 'phags pa'i bde ba chen por 'dren pa'i thabs
NK103(pe)012:30: yang na mtshan dang sbyar ro //
NK103(pe)012:31: sgra tshad la sogs pa cis kyang mtshon par bya
NK103(pe)012:32: ba'i yul las 'das pa'i rang bzhin dbyer med du
NK103(pe)012:34: mu bzhi cir yang rnam pa'i rang 'od ma 'gags par thams cad lhun grub tu rdzogs pas chub //
NK103(pe)012:35: de ltar mkhyen pa'i rang rig rang gsal la gzung
NK103(pe)012:36: 'dzin gyi dri mas ma gos par dag pas sems
NK103(pe)012:37: // de gsum gdod ma nas mtshon tshul ma 'dres
NK103(pe)012:38: la ngo bo dbyer med du yongs su rdzogs pa
NK103(pe)012:39: // ni // dper na klu dga sha ka 'jog
NK103(pe)012:40: po yi gtsug gi rgyan gyi nor bu bzhin du
NK103(pe)012:41: // ni // // rtog pa med ba la dgos
NK103(pe)012:42: pa dang 'dod pa thams cad 'byung bar ldan pas
NK103(pe)012:43: // ni // // rin po che'o // rig pas
NK103(pe)012:44: bsdus pa'i shes bya thams cad de dang 'dra ba
NK103(pe)012:45: // ni // // rin po che'o // nyid du
NK103(pe)012:46: // rtsol sgrub kyis ma btsal ba gdod ma nas
NK103(pe)012:47: gnas pas lhun grub don gyi gnas lugs dngos po'i
NK103(pe)012:48: // ni // // rin po che'o // nyid du
NK103(pe)012:49: // gshis so // de nyid rang snang yin pas
NK103(pe)012:50: blo'i yul na mi gnas pa dang nges byed kyi
NK103(pe)012:52: rang gis rang gi ngo ma shes pas //
NK103(pe)012:53: gshis bden pa'i don du ye nas gnas kyang ngo bos bskal te lhan skyes kyi ma rig bas //
NK103(pe)012:54: ngar 'dzin pa'i mthu las gzhan du snang ba'i yul
NK103(pe)012:55: sdug mi sdug la sogs pa tha dad du kun
NK103(pe)012:56: tu brtags pa'i // cha las 'dis nyon mongs par byed pa dug lnga yi bdud //
NK103(pe)012:57: chos nyid kyi rang bzhin spros bral la bar du
NK103(pe)012:58: bcad pa ltar du spros pa sna tshogs su 'phros
NK103(pe)012:59: pa'o // 'du byed sems pa las kyi mthu yis phung po blangs pa ni phung po'i bdud de //
NK103(pe)012:60: sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi rang 'od rnam
NK103(pe)012:61: pa yul la sgo lngas mtshan mar bzung bas bar
NK103(pe)012:63: srog gi rgyun 'dzin cing shes pa brten pa'i rlung
NK103(pe)012:64: gis nus pa las dang rkyen gyis zad nas tshe
NK103(pe)012:65: 'pho // ba ni 'chi bdag gi bdud de chos
NK103(pe)012:66: nyid 'gyur ba med pa la bar du bcad pa
NK103(pe)012:67: ltar skye rgas na 'chi'i chu bo bzhi srid pas
NK103(pe)012:68: 'pho // so // rang gi rnam par rtog pas
NK103(pe)012:69: sems las bar chod gzhan du bzung ba lta bu'i
NK103(pe)012:70: 'pho // so // bdud yis // slu ba'i bri
NK103(pe)012:71: tas mchog thun mong gi dngos grub la bar du
NK103(pe)012:73: de ltar bdud bzhi yis gnas lugs byang chub kyi
NK103(pe)012:75: rigs drug gi sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang theg brgyad kyi rtsol ba'i nad kyis mnar ba //
NK103(pe)012:76: des na snying po rnam ma 'byung ba'i dus drug la bab pa'i tshe //
NK103(pe)012:77: yang sprul sems lhag gi rkyen gyis lha'i dbang pos phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bskul bas //
NK103(pe)012:78: rtsol bcas kyi theg bas bdud las mi grol te don rtsol med dang 'gal bas so //
NK103(pe)012:79: don ngo bo'i sku ma bcos pa las shar bas rgyal po chos kyi sku la la //
NK103(pe)012:80: 'chad pa'i skyes bu rdo rje sems dpas gsang bdag
NK103(pe)012:81: phyag rdor thugs las sprul te sems lhag can bkrol
NK103(pe)012:82: te // chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid gsal la
NK103(pe)012:83: rang bzhin stong ste rnam pa 'gag med du bcas
NK103(pe)012:84: te // pas // mi bzhi'i phyogs ris dang bral
NK103(pe)012:85: ba'i bde ba chen por ma bcos par rang bkrol
NK103(pe)012:86: te // pas // ba'i // rtogs pa'i thabs chen
NK103(pe)012:87: rtsi yis rtsol med kyi bde bar bdud bzhi ma
NK103(pe)012:89: de ltar rtogs par byed pa'i thabs rang rig pa la rang dbang ye nas rdzogs pa'i don de /
NK103(pe)012:90: rgyal thabs spyi blugs kyi dbang gis brda 'jal bar byed pa'o //
NK103(pe)012:91: yul shes rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa phyag rgya chen po yi don gyi //
NK103(pe)012:92: snying po de rtogs pas len pas na dkyil 'khor der //
NK103(pe)012:93: bsrung bar bya ba'i mtshams dang bral bar rtogs pas don la 'da' ba med pa'i phyir //
NK103(pe)012:94: bsrung bar bya byed kyi rtsol ba dang bral ba rig pa'i dam tshig phog la //
NK103(pe)012:95: bya byed kyi rtsol bas ma btsal bar mu matha'i
NK103(pe)012:96: phyogs 'dzin kun zhi la mkhyen gsal gyi ye shes
NK103(pe)012:97: rgyas // 'khor 'das thams cad byang chub kyi sems
NK103(pe)012:98: kyi dbang du 'dus la grub matha'i phyogs ris mnyams
NK103(pe)012:99: pa'i ngang du bsgral bas drag po'i phrin las so
NK103(pe)012:100: rgyas // // rnam shes tshogs brgyad lhun gnas bde chen nyid du rang grol ba'i //
NK103(pe)012:101: rtogs pa'i gdeng chen po tshad du phyin par ldan pas //
NK103(pe)012:102: gong gi bar chad kyi bdud bzhi la rtogs pa'i rtsi yis //
NK103(pe)012:103: bdud dgag ba dang bde chen sgrub pa ma yin
NK103(pe)012:104: par ye nas bde chen du gnas pa de rtogs
NK103(pe)012:105: pas mjal ba'o // yid kyis dmigs pa gtad nas
NK103(pe)012:106: rnam rtog dang phral ba min pas rang tang te
NK103(pe)012:107: pas mjal ba'o // // rang bzhin rtogs pa'i sor
NK103(pe)012:108: gnas pas so ma re dogs dang bral bas lhug
NK103(pe)012:109: pas mjal ba'o // // pa ste // de ltar
NK103(pe)012:110: goms pa'i rgyun ma chad par chu rgyun lta bu'i
NK103(pe)012:111: ngang du rgyun du gnas pas //
NK103(pe)012:112: bag la nyal gyi sgrib pa sangs pa ni sgom pa'i gzer chen po yin no //
NK103(pe)012:113: rtogs goms kyi don la gnas te lhag pa'i spyod
NK103(pe)012:114: pas grogs dang mthun par spyad pas de la mos
NK103(pe)012:116: gzhan phan gyi thugs rje dang nyes skyon gyis mi
NK103(pe)012:117: gos pa'i thabs kyis dkar spyod dang nag spyod mi
NK103(pe)012:118: dge ba 'go bsnyams nas gang gis 'dul ba spyod
NK103(pe)012:119: do // nges par na dge sdig thams cad kyi phyogs ris dang bral bas //
NK103(pe)012:120: blang dor gyi 'du shes las grol ba ni rtogs goms kyi gdeng chen po la rdzogs pa'o //
NK103(pe)012:121: rim par sbyangs pas non pa ma yin te ye nas ma bcos par gnas pas sa /
NK103(pe)012:122: rtsol bas ma bgrod par bde ba chen po'i gnas su phyin par byed pas lam mo //
NK103(pe)012:123: klong de dag la goms pas rgyun ma chad par gnas na //
NK103(pe)012:124: skye bo tha mal pa'i bag chags las grol ba'i mthangs rmi lam du //
NK103(pe)012:125: rtogs goms kyi gdeng la gnas pa'i ya mtshan du gyur pa du ma 'char ba //
NK103(pe)012:126: de'i tshe dbang po yang rab mthong bas tshe 'di la grol te //
NK103(pe)012:127: de yang chos thams cad rig pa'i rang 'od kyi rnam pa ma 'gags pa yin bas //
NK103(pe)012:128: tshe'i rgyun khalus kyi phung po chad kapa dang 'dor ga ba las grol lo //
NK103(pe)012:129: rab kyis tshe rgyun lus kha zad ka pa dang rkyen gyis 'dor gaba'i tshe //
NK103(pe)012:130: tshogs drug lte bar sa'i rlung la rkyen gyis rang
NK103(pe)012:131: gi gnas nas zhugs te thim pas yul du mi
NK103(pe)012:133: sa rlung de rang gi lam nas snying kha'i chu
NK103(pe)012:134: rlung la 'dus pa'i dus na des sa dang bral
NK103(pe)012:135: bas lus nyam chung zhing bu ga nas chu 'dzag
NK103(pe)012:136: / de nyid lkog mar me rlung la rang gi
NK103(pe)012:137: lam nas zhugs na chu dang bral bas drod skye
NK103(pe)012:138: ste bu ga'i sgo nas skam //
NK103(pe)012:139: de sum mdo'i rlung la 'phyos na lus kyi drod
NK103(pe)012:140: nyams de ye shes snying po la thim pas dbugs
NK103(pe)012:142: srog gi dbang po dngos ye shes nyid snying po'i
NK103(pe)012:143: rlung de me long la has btab pa ltar phyir
NK103(pe)012:144: yal bas na nang gi rtsa'i kha bye //
NK103(pe)012:145: ste khrag babs pas rnam par shes pa khrag gis brgyal bas na //
NK103(pe)012:146: dmar lam gyi snang ba'i 'khor los longs sku ru chags pa yin la //
NK103(pe)012:147: rnam shes de'i rgyun gzhungs sa dang klad rgyas kyi rtsa nang du zhugs te //
NK103(pe)012:148: rnam par shes pa byang chub kyi sems kyis brgyal bas na //
NK103(pe)012:149: dkar lam gyis snang ba ni gong las cher mched pa'i 'khor lo chos kyi sku'o //
NK103(pe)012:150: de nas shes pa drug sgra don spyi'i yul dang bcas pa nub ste //
NK103(pe)012:151: lus dang sems gnyis kyi 'brel pa'i rgyun chad de mun rum ltar //
NK103(pe)012:152: gyi gnag lam gyis gang yang ma rig pa la reg pa'i 'khor lo nyer 'thob //
NK103(pe)012:153: de las dper na gnyid dam rmugs pa las sad pa ltar du //
NK103(pe)012:154: yul med rang gsal gyi rig pa'i rang 'od gsal gyi 'khor lo zer 'od kyis //
NK103(pe)012:155: shes bya kun gsal bar snang ba yang dper na 'ja' lta bu ru //
NK103(pe)012:156: bden pa'i ngos gzung cis kyang stong par rig pa rang 'od sad do //
NK103(pe)012:157: tshe 'da' kar yang rtogs pa'i don la goms pas gnas par bya zhing //
NK103(pe)012:158: grogs po'i mchog dang bla mas tshig tu'ang don la gnas par bskul //
NK103(pe)012:159: rang gi dran pas kyang 'od gsal yang dang yang du bsam //
NK103(pe)012:160: de shar ba'i tshe na nges shes bskyed cing //
NK103(pe)012:161: de'i ngang la gnas pas srid pa 'khor ba'i mtha' ma der zad de //
NK103(pe)012:162: mtshan nyid kun mkhyen longs sku rang bzhin ngos med chos sku rnam pa sgyu mar sprul sku sgrol //
NK103(pe)012:163: de ltar ye shes kyi bar do'i tshe don la nges pa'i shes pa ma skyes na //
NK103(pe)012:164: gong las slar bzlog par yang gnag lam ma rig
NK103(pe)012:165: pa'i mun pa la reg cing 'khor lo thob pa
NK103(pe)012:166: // de las dkar lam gyi snang ba mched pa de las dmar lam gyi snang ba 'byung ste //
NK103(pe)012:167: de'i tshe zas su dri za ba 'chi skye'i bar
NK103(pe)012:168: ma do zhag bdun pa na rigs mthun pa re
NK103(pe)012:169: 'gyur zhing // las kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi shugs dang
NK103(pe)012:170: dpag tshad du ma'ang 'od kyi snang ba dang ldan
NK103(pe)012:171: sgyu ma lta bu'i lus la thogs pa dang 'byung
NK103(pe)012:172: ba bzhi la rdug pa med //
NK103(pe)012:173: las kyi lha'i mig gi mngon shes kyis rigs mthun
NK103(pe)012:174: dang 'og ma rnams mthong bar ldan zhing rdzus te
NK103(pe)012:176: gdos bcas kyi 'byung pa'i lus dang bral te dwangs
NK103(pe)012:177: ma las byung ba'i yid kyi lus phyis skye ba'i
NK103(pe)012:178: cha byad mngon du 'byung ba ni dbang po kun
NK103(pe)012:179: gsal zhing yan lag tshang ba'o //
NK103(pe)012:180: rigs mthun barje ba de'i tshe bdun tshigs su gzhan
NK103(pe)012:181: gyi las bzang po'i grogs kyis stong bya ba ni
NK103(pe)012:182: gces pa'o // rang nyid kyis ngos zin na blo mnyam par bzhag ste bzhi thun la sogs pa'i //
NK103(pe)012:183: thun cig dgongs pa la gnas pas sdug bsngal las rang grol ba'ang yin te //
NK103(pe)012:184: sems sbyangs pa'i rang gi sngar gyi las ni shin tu gces par gsungs so //
NK103(pe)012:185: rang gi las dang gzhan gyi stongs des kyang nges par grol ma nus te ma rig pa na //
NK103(pe)012:186: bar ma'i lus la sdang bas 'dor bar 'dod pa
NK103(pe)012:187: dang ma 'ongs pa la chags pa'i bsam pas phyis
NK103(pe)012:188: skye ba'i grong don du gnyer bas //
NK103(pe)012:189: srid pa nying mtshams sbyor te de yang gshin rje
NK103(pe)012:190: chos kyi rgyal pos las kyi me long ston te
NK103(pe)012:191: // 'du byed las gsum po gang gi 'phro yod
NK103(pe)012:192: pa de len pa'i rnam par shes pa dkar lam
NK103(pe)012:194: khrid nas dmar lam khrag dang ldan pa'i ma'i mngal
NK103(pe)012:195: gyi nang du skyel te 'dres pa ni ming dang
NK103(pe)012:196: gzugs // rlung bdun phrag so brgyad kyis rkyen byed
NK103(pe)012:197: pa las zla ba gsum ste zhag bdun phrag bcu
NK103(pe)012:198: gsum na rang gi las kyi rlung rnam par 'byed
NK103(pe)012:200: skye mched drug gi bug pa dgu dod reg pa
NK103(pe)012:201: gsum 'dus nas gcod pas tshora ba gsum myongs te
NK103(pe)012:202: bkres pas lus // nyam chung zhing zas la sred
NK103(pe)012:203: pa dang pho kayis mos ga pha 1ma kha1len pa
NK103(pe)012:204: bkres pas lus // de la // zhes pas srid
NK103(pe)012:205: pa'i chags pa spyod la zla ba dgur brgyal te
NK103(pe)012:207: phyir 'byung ba ni skye ba rgyun gzhan du 'gyur
NK103(pe)012:208: ba ni rga ba nad dang 'chi bar bcas pa
NK103(pe)012:209: ste // srid pa'i yan lag bcu gnyis kyi 'khor lo de ltar yang bskyar ba yin la //
NK103(pe)012:210: sngar sbyangs pa'i las smon gyi 'brel pas theg pa
NK103(pe)012:211: mchog dam pa rdzogs chen ston pa dang phrad de
NK103(pe)012:212: shes rab gsum la sbyong ba la yang //
NK103(pe)012:213: bdag po dang dmigs pa'i rkyen rkyen dang rang rang
NK103(pe)012:214: gi blo dang brtson pa'i stobs kyi mthu ma nges
NK103(pe)012:215: pa yis skye ba du len gyi grangs ma nges
NK103(pe)012:216: so // gang zag kha cig nyams rim gnyis pa
NK103(pe)012:217: mi g.yo ba'i ting nge la gnas pa thob nas
NK103(pe)012:218: so // // lha yi gnas su skye ba blangs te sangs rgyas su grol lha yi rigs //
NK103(pe)012:221: byang chub kyi snying po'i don rang byung gi ye
NK103(pe)012:222: shes rang gsal bar rang bzhin gyis ma bcos par
NK103(pe)012:223: mthar phyin pa'i // rtsol bcas kyi 'bras bu dang
NK103(pe)012:224: mtshungs pa med pa'i mtshan nyid gsal la rang bzhin
NK103(pe)012:225: cis kyang stong pa de la //
NK103(pe)012:226: che ba bzhi mngon rdzogs par brda sprad de lnga bdag de chos sangs rgyas med pa'i che ba /
NK103(pe)012:227: yis bla dwags rang grol bas //
NK103(pe)012:228: kun gyi blar gyur chos sku mchog /
NK103(pe)012:229: shes bya kun mkhyen pa la bde chen gyi rgyan gyis longsa spyod brgyan pas //
NK103(pe)012:230: shes bya'i lhag ma rdzogs pa'i med par mu mtha'
NK103(pe)012:231: thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa ni nyid longs sku'o
NK103(pe)012:232: // lam la gnas pa rang rgyud dag pas bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i ngo la //
NK103(pe)012:233: 'khor los sgyur sku ba'i rgyal po'i sku lta bu
NK103(pe)012:234: la brda dang dgongs pas brgyan pa ni gzhan longs
NK103(pe)012:235: sku'o // de thugs rje chen po'i sprul pa'i rnam pa 'gags med du 'char ba de //
NK103(pe)012:236: gdul bya dag pa lam gnyis thob pa dang ma dag pa rigs drug gi sems can la //
NK103(pe)012:237: lha'i thub pa la sogs pa drug dang 'byung ba lnga ni 'khor lo'i rgyun gyi theg pa ste //
NK103(pe)012:238: snod bcud sna tshogs cir snang yang btsal ba med par sprul pas de dag gi rgyud sbyong ba'o //
NK103(pe)012:239: sku gsum po de dag mtshon tshul nas ma 'dres
NK103(pe)012:240: la ngo bo dbyer med du yongs su rdzogs pa'o
NK103(pe)012:241: // theg pa kun gyi 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs
NK103(pe)012:242: pa'i 'bras bu ni phyogs gcig par 'dzin pa cir
NK103(pe)012:243: yang gi mtha' las grol ba ni //
NK103(pe)012:244: cho ga sngags dang yo byad kyis btsal ba dang bsnyen bsgrub kyis ma h+aa bsgrub 1pas /
NK103(pe)012:245: dbyings dang ye shes a nu rgyu 'bras 1phyi rgyud
NK103(pe)012:246: 'brel bas sgyur bas gnyen pos mtshan nyid spangs pas
NK103(pe)012:247: thob pas // de dag las grol ba lhun gyis
NK103(pe)012:248: grub par gnas pas rtsol med kyi bde ba chen
NK103(pe)012:249: thob pas // po'i sa'o // lha'i gnas sum cu rtsa gsum du //
NK103(pe)012:250: bdud rtsi sman bsgrub pa las sar chud pa'i rigs 'dzin grub de //
NK103(pe)012:251: snying po rnal ma'i don la rig pa'i rtsal ma 'byongs pas mi'i gnas su byon pa la //
NK103(pe)012:252: 'jam dpal bshes gnyen gyi byams pa'i nyi zer zhags pas bdag bzung ba yang //
NK103(pe)012:253: rtsol bcas kyi theg bas yid skyo sun byung nas rtsol med kyi theg pa btsal bas //
NK103(pe)012:254: rtsol bcas las gzhan du gyur pa nas rtsol med rnyed par ma gyur te //
NK103(pe)012:255: rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i sems nyid rang rtsol bral gyi bde ba chen por /
NK103(pe)012:256: rtsol med rang la gnas pa la ngam pa e
NK103(pe)012:257: ma'o rang grol ba ni sku drin shin tu che'o
NK103(pe)012:258: // gser gyi zo bar seng ge'i 'o ma'i bcud len pa ltar du //
NK103(pe)012:259: rdzogs chen gyi rigs can la rnal ma'i rgyud gtad pas 'bras bu'i snying por smin no //
NK103(pe)012:260: klu'i gdug sems spangs pa'i gzhan nas snying po rnal ma'i don cig /
NK103(pe)012:265: sangs rgyas kyi spyan lngas ma gzigs pas gdug pa'i sems de nyid la rtogs shig pa'o //
NK103(pe)012:266: tshogs brgyad rang grol ba man ngag gis brda sprad pas skabs nyer bdun phye la //
NK103(pe)012:267: phyogs ris dang bral ba'i phyag rgya nyi shu rtsa lngas brda don gyi zhen pa dgrol //
NK103(pe)012:268: rnam rtog gi spros pa thig le drug gis bcad
NK103(pe)012:269: che ba lngas khyad par 'phags par ston pa ni
NK103(pe)012:270: // rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che'o //
NK103(pe)012:271: klu'i gdug pas snying po rnal ma'i 'od mi gsal bar nus pa la //
NK103(pe)012:272: tshad ma gsum gyis rang gsal yul med du rang gsal ba'o //
NK103(pe)012:273: ngang la gnas pas bag chags kyi rnyog pa rang sangs te ye shes kyi rang 'od rgyas pas //
NK103(pe)012:274: 'gro ba'i ma rig pa'i mun pa sel bar byed pa 'di mi nub par ston khacig pa'o //
NK103(pe)012:276: byang chub kyi sems rin po che bdud rtsi chu
NK103(pe)012:277: rgyun che mchog rgyan gyi 'khor lo zhes bya ba
NK103(pe)012:278: / slob dpon lha'i rgyal po bdud rtsi chos kyi rgyal pos mdzad pa /
NK103(pe)012:279: rdzogs so////rgya gar gyi mkhan po sh+r+ai sing+ha pra b+ha ba ta dang //
NK103(pe)012:280: slob dpon bee ro tsa nas yul d+ha he na'i
NK103(pe)012:281: 'du khang du zhus shing bsgyur te gtan la phab
NK103(pe)012:282: pa'o // se'i ban+d+he 'byung ldan gyis mchan bu rang
NK103(pe)012:283: gi rnam rtog dang mthun par btab pa lags so
NK103(pe)012:284: pa'o // // dge ba 'di yis mtha' yas 'gro ba rnams //
NK103(pe)012:285: btsal med bde chen sar gnas smon //
NK103(pe)012:286: gzhung gi dgongs pa ji bzhin ma rtogs rnams //
